segments.text: Where do you want to go this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to the lake and camp on the south side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to take the jet ski ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's just rent one this time . The AC is broken in the truck , remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's right . Renting is good !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should we call the Olsen's and ask them if they want to join us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you go out to the garage and check out the camping gear .
segments.speaker: S2
